Can you write like a Victorian novel?

Open Vibecheck

Use the Victorian Vibecheck to find out how period appropriate your word choice is! The Vibecheck is a just-for-fun tool originally conceived to help writers for the game write in Victorian language. The vibecheck quantifies how rarely, if ever, the words in a text appear in the Victorian novels corpus. It then assigns a score to the inputted text based on whether it over- or underuses words of particular frequencies. The user may input their own text or choose from a set of preset examples.
